access.name: anonymous
access.description: Default role that allows anyone to see a form

components.html:
• record the number of functioning and non-functioning units of detection and other equipment for your port
  • record separately the number of customs staff trained formally, and informally, to operate these equipment
  • record details of maintenance contracts and breakdown cover for these equipment
components.label: topparagraph

components.html:
Make sure only the designated representative officer from the port completes this form as this form needs to be completed only once per port. Ensure all the necessary details are collected before attempting to complete the form. Assuming all the data has been collected beforehand, completing this form takes on average 30 minutes and can be completed using your poise mobile or laptop. 

Please note, there is no save form function so it is vital that this information is fully collected before you attempt to complete the required information. We suggest you log into the form first to see what is required before trying to input your information. You can submit multiple times if you wish to record a few equipment at a time. 

The details of staff relating to equipment should be limited to customs based staff only, not immigration only staff. 

This data will be used to develop the capability map for the UK and juxtaposed ports and assess any gaps that may need addressing.
components.label: bottomParagraph
Why do I need to provide my security clearance details?
components.content:
Who are BF National Operations with Detection Services?
BF National Operations with Detection Services purchases detection equipment and re-tenders contracts. They also develop and trial new technologies and training. For more information on what BF National Operations with Detection Services can do for you, please email BFDetectionServices@homeoffice.gov.uk

components.label: Select the port for this inventory
HTML
components.content: ! Warning Please use estimates, if exact figures are not known.

components.label: Do you want to add detection equipment(s) to this inventory?
Select Detection equipment at the port
Number of formally trained staff on the equipment
components.description: Formally trained refers to officers who have attended classroom training for the equipment.

components.label: Number of informally trained staff on the equipment
components.description: Informally trained refers to officers who have been shown how to use the equipment 'on the job'.

components.label: Number of staff not trained on the equipment
components.description: This refers to staff who have no formal or informal training on the equipment, but work in a customs environment.

components.label: Does the equipment have an annual maintenance contract?
Does the equipment have breakdown cover?
Is this equipment shared with any other port?
Select the main port with which the equipment is shared
Please provide details of any other detection equipment not included in the list above
